name: Cathedrals' Treasures
description:
Summary

Learn about cathedral acoustics with Cathedral's Treasures! In this game, Kunnuth the gargoyle will guide you through the Chapter House.

This is a very special place inside the York Minster (a beautiful cathedral in England)... what makes it so cool is the way things sound there. Kunnuth loves this place; they will show you two challenges so that you can enjoy and learn about the acoustics of the Chapter House.

Are you brave enough to seek... the Cathedral's Treasures?

Controls
  • Move your mouse to look around the cathedral
  • Use your mouse left click to select and activate items
  • Press the space key to load the next dialogue
  • Close this tab on your browser to close the game
Requirements
  • You can play this game in a computer (not on a smartphone!)
  • For best results, play it with the Google Chrome or Firefox
Credits

Developed by Lidia Alvarez and Alvaro Caceres from the Department of Theatre, Film, Television and Interactive Media (University of York, United Kingdom)
